title: Arduino Radar
desc: The radar can detect objects in front of it and map them on PC screen using the Processing IDE.

title: Range Measurer and Digital Spirit Level
desc: We will use it to make an distance meter which can measure distances up to 4 meters.

title: Arduino Robot Arm
desc: This Arduino project is actually a robotic arm made out of 3D printed parts servo motors joints and controlled using an Arduino Nano. What’s even cooler we can control the robot arm wirelessly via a smartphone and a custom build Android application.

title: Arduino Robot Car
desc: Here we will build our own robot car from scratch. The car will be powered with Li-ion batteries and two 12V DC motors and controlled using the L298N driver and an analog Joystick.

title: DIY Arduino based RC Transmitter
desc: Arduino based wireless radio controller. With this RC transmitter I can wirelessly control pretty much with a range up to 700m in open space. It features 14 channels (6 of which are analog and 8 digital inputs).
